itemDescription: Businessperson and Member of the House of Lords (born 1943)

wikipedia_page.main: Rajinder Paul Loomba, Baron Loomba, CBE (born 13 November 1943, Dhilwan, Punjab, India) is a philanthropist, founder and executive chairman of clothing company Loomba Group, and a member of the House of Lords.

link_mentions.page: List of ethnic minority politicians in the United Kingdom
Raj Loomba CBE, Baron Loomba of Moor Park
